content.html: This rock glows Most sodalite will fluoresce orange under ultraviolet light Electromagnetic radiation (light from the UV flashlight) is absorbed which then re-emits radiation at a longer wavelength – in this case, the yellow glow 1/
content.value:
This rock glows 

Most sodalite will fluoresce orange under ultraviolet light 

Electromagnetic radiation (light from the UV flashlight) is absorbed which then re-emits radiation at a longer wavelength – in this case, the yellow glow 1/
